name: Mind Swap
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell is similar to possession, except you switch minds with the target, so instead of the target's soul sharing its body with yours and being unable to act, the target's mind moves to your body and can control it as if you each had cast possession on the other.
text_zh: 该法术的功能类似于占据术（Possession），不过你会与目标对调精神，因此取代占据术（Possession）中让你与目标的灵魂共享身体并且让目标无法行动的效果，目标的精神能够驾驭你的身体，而且能够对其进行操控，就好像你们两方都对对方施放了占据术（Possession）一般。
